multi_dwelling_workflow_999.R1_1: Based on your selections the height of this dwelling unit exceeds the maximum height of the building and the maximum height permitted for a Part 9 Building. Based on this the building can not be newly constructed to Part 9 of the BC Building Code. Please review your selections for error, if the height of the building exceeds 3 storeys the building will need to be designed in accordance with Parts 3, 4, 5, and 6 in place of Part 9. This tool only evaluates the Building Code compliance of buildings designed in accordance with Part 9 of the BC Building Code 2024, if there are no errors in your selections, please contact the appropriate required design professionals for this building.
multi_dwelling_workflow_999.R1_2: Based on your selections this building does not comply with the BC Building Code 2024 as this dwelling unit is not provided with a Building Code Compliant means of egress.
multi_dwelling_workflow_999.R1_3: The evaluated dwelling unit has been deemed to satisfy all requirements of Subsection 9.9.9. of the Building Code. If there are additional dwelling units within this building that have not had their means of egress evaluated for compliance with the BC Building Code 2024 click "Start Over" below.
